Currently, we employ an Ant Select component, which does not actually use a select element in the DOM.

We could switch out the Ant Select with our own component that actually uses a select input, however the issue there is we then need to have to make sure we match look, feel, and functionality of the Ant component. I'd prefer to not make a one-off select input that we use only in this scenario, so it'd need to match the rest of the Select stuff.

@rehandalal Thoughts?
